xierpa3.constants.config package¶

Submodules¶

xierpa3.constants.config.COPYTO_config module¶

class xierpa3.constants.config.COPYTO_config.Config¶

Bases: xierpa3.constants.config.baseconfig.BaseConfig

Inheriting all default values from BaseConfig. Just uncomment and redefine the values if different from the default.

ACCESSKEYID = ''¶
PYTHONAPP = 'python2.7'¶
SECRETACCESSKEY = ''¶

xierpa3.constants.config.baseconfig module¶

class xierpa3.constants.config.baseconfig.BaseConfig¶

Bases: object

The abstract <b>ConfigModel</b> class implements the default values for the abstract <b>Config</b> class in <i>config.py</i> that defines all hardware specific class variables.
